attributes.action: CHANGE THE WAY SPECIAL NEEDS STATEMENTS ARE WRITTEN BY INTRODUCING AN INDEPENDENT BODY .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The special needs children of this country are being let down in provision of education by the lack of specialist knowledge by special needs education officers  within the goverments own dept for special needs education. Statements are being wrongly written , evidence not understood , and mistakes are costing children and parents months in some cases years of education most are ending up costing thousands of pounds to take to sendist tribunals that shouldnt of happened in the first place costing both time and money as well as distress to both child and parent involved . We need action now to ensure that independent experianced bodies are responsible for these very important documents not just  the goverments pen pushers who have no experiance just a small amount of training not enough to decide a childs future .WE NEED THIS INDEPENDENT BODY NOW FOR OUR CHILDRENS FUTURE ...
